snippet.title: Ace of Rope - Initial Trailer
snippet.description:
Play here: https://cagibi.itch.io/ace-of-rope

A mysterious criminal can control the gallows' rope around their neck. It's time for revenge!

Ace of Rope is an action game with wacky weapons, mysterious pardners, and dangerous duels. Enjoy your journey, and avoid the dangers of the West!

This is a reupload. I made the original trailer before I knew much about trailer making. Changes include: removing some title cards, letterboxes, amateurish transitions, and getting to the gameplay faster. The footage is the same though :P
